about_the_game:
Hard as Hell is a game where you play as a store owner trying to make ends meet in the bustling C.R.T. City in the year 1999. However, a wave of goons overtake the vulnerable city, and you’re forced to defend your store against waves of destructive enemies.

Blending FPS and tower defence mechanics, Hard as Hell lets you explore C.R.T. city at night, gathering resources and recruiting volunteers to fortify your shop. During the day, you’ll fight off waves of attackers from either the roof of your store or down in the streets, engaging in close combat. In Hard as Hell you must hold out for eight days, with each day becoming more challenging as the attackers grow in strength and numbers.

The gameplay draws inspiration from classic 90s FPS titles, delivering that nostalgic feel. Don your bandana, and fight to protect your store in this intense gauntlet.

FEATURES

- Various weaponry to blast goons with

- Smoking cigarettes to heal

- Recruit allies to give you cover from atop rooftops

- Stylistic/Artistic scenery

- Robust gunplay and action

- Craft bandanas to give unique perks

content_descriptors.notes: DISCLAIMER: This content may include themes of violence, coarse language, and the legal use of tobacco.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later, or a comparable distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.7 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later, or a comparable distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 compatible GPU with 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: It's 1999, and C.R.T. City has plunged into chaos. The crime ridden city has been devastated by vandalism, theft, and destruction... But the tired populous band together. Protect your store, property, and pride from the angry masses, in this blend of a Tower Defence and FPS.
